subject: Automobiles
Speed Limits and Speeding
lead_paragraph: The transcontinental jaunt known as the Bullrun allows participants to revive the notion of driving muscle cars across America like bats out of hell, for a $20,000 entry fee.
snippet: The transcontinental jaunt known as the Bullrun allows participants to revive the notion of driving muscle cars across America like bats out of hell, for a $20,000 entry fee.
